pkgmetadata.longdescription: runit is a process supervision suite with a focus on being usable as a sysvinit replacement. It provides similar functionality to other packages like sys-apps/s6 and sys-process/daemontools, and a compatibility/migration path for the latter. As this package only provides an init and service manager, it still depends on sys-apps/openrc for the rc layer inbetween.

use.flag: Create /service symlink to allow abbreviated `sv` commands without setting $SVDIR
